column4: newbie q:) hey i'm having some trouble installing an app... when i try to install it, i get an error message that the command make is not found...
do i have to modify the script, or can i resolve this another way
other than build-essential? I don't know, check what it's asking for
I assume you're trying to compile something from scratch, you'll probably have to install libxxx-dev if it says it can't find xxx
